metadata.title: CVE-2023-6349 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A heap overflow vulnerability exists in libvpx - Encoding a frame that haslarger dimensions than the originally configured size with VP9 may resultin a heap overflow in libvpx. We recommend upgrading to version 1.13.1 orabove

criterions.comment: libvpx package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
